subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It has been a vertigo-inducing baseball season so far, with the Biogenesis scandal, the rise of the Pirates, the fall of the Giants and the excitement over Yasiel Puig.
snippet: It has been a vertigo-inducing baseball season so far, with the Biogenesis scandal, the rise of the Pirates, the fall of the Giants and the excitement over Yasiel Puig.
